alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Floyd; Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cherokee, east central Floyd, southwestern Gordon and central Bartow Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Plainville to Bridgemill, and moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Canton, Cartersville, Adairsville, Emerson, White, Kingston, Plainville, Cassville, Shannon, Pinson, Kellogg Creek, Red Top Mountain State Park, Oak Grove, Little River Landing, George Washington Carver St Pk, Sutallee, Hobgood Park and Bridgemill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
